After swallow tafamidis , tafamidis blood concentration measure periodically 6 day . After 14 day , subject take different formulation tafamidis tafamidis blood concentration measure periodically 6 day . After another 14 day , last formulation test way .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Amounts Tafamidis In The Blood Without Food
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female nonchild bear potential . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 total body weight 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Blood pressure screen visit great 140 mm Hg ( systolic ) 90 mg Hg ( diastolic ) . Use prescription nonprescription drug supplement within 7 day prior 7 day study . Pregnant female subject ; breastfeed female subject ; male subject partner currently pregnant ; male subject able father child unwilling unable use highly effective method contraception .
